description: Learn front-end and back-end development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Master Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign to create professional graphics and layouts.
Comprehensive training on SEO, social media marketing, Google Ads, and email marketing.
Understand ethical hacking, system security, and network protection strategies.
Build native Android applications using Kotlin, Android Studio, and Firebase integration.
